<a id="VisualShaderNodeFloatOp"></a>

# VisualShaderNodeFloatOp

**Inherits:** [VisualShaderNode](VisualShaderNode.md) **\<** [Resource](Resource.md) **\<** [RefCounted](RefCounted.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

A floating-point scalar operator to be used within the visual shader graph.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

Applies [operator](VisualShaderNodeFloatOp.md#VisualShaderNodeFloatOp_property_operator) to two floating-point inputs: ``a`` and ``b``.

<!-- classref-reftable-group -->

## Enumerations

<!-- classref-enumeration -->

<a id="VisualShaderNodeFloatOp_constant_OP_ADD"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[Operator](VisualShaderNodeFloatOp.md#enum_VisualShaderNodeFloatOp_Operator) **OP_ADD** = `0`

Sums two numbers using ``a + b``.<a id="VisualShaderNodeFloatOp_constant_OP_SUB"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[Operator](VisualShaderNodeFloatOp.md#enum_VisualShaderNodeFloatOp_Operator) **OP_SUB** = `1`

Subtracts two numbers using ``a - b``.<a id="VisualShaderNodeFloatOp_constant_OP_MUL"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[Operator](VisualShaderNodeFloatOp.md#enum_VisualShaderNodeFloatOp_Operator) **OP_MUL** = `2`

Multiplies two numbers using ``a * b``.<a id="VisualShaderNodeFloatOp_constant_OP_DIV"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[Operator](VisualShaderNodeFloatOp.md#enum_VisualShaderNodeFloatOp_Operator) **OP_DIV** = `3`

Divides two numbers using ``a / b``.<a id="VisualShaderNodeFloatOp_constant_OP_MOD"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[Operator](VisualShaderNodeFloatOp.md#enum_VisualShaderNodeFloatOp_Operator) **OP_MOD** = `4`

Calculates the remainder of two numbers. Translates to ``mod(a, b)`` in the Redot Shader Language.<a id="VisualShaderNodeFloatOp_constant_OP_POW"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[Operator](VisualShaderNodeFloatOp.md#enum_VisualShaderNodeFloatOp_Operator) **OP_POW** = `5`

Raises the ``a`` to the power of ``b``. Translates to ``pow(a, b)`` in the Redot Shader Language.<a id="VisualShaderNodeFloatOp_constant_OP_MAX"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[Operator](VisualShaderNodeFloatOp.md#enum_VisualShaderNodeFloatOp_Operator) **OP_MAX** = `6`

Returns the greater of two numbers. Translates to ``max(a, b)`` in the Redot Shader Language.<a id="VisualShaderNodeFloatOp_constant_OP_MIN"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[Operator](VisualShaderNodeFloatOp.md#enum_VisualShaderNodeFloatOp_Operator) **OP_MIN** = `7`

Returns the lesser of two numbers. Translates to ``min(a, b)`` in the Redot Shader Language.<a id="VisualShaderNodeFloatOp_constant_OP_ATAN2"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[Operator](VisualShaderNodeFloatOp.md#enum_VisualShaderNodeFloatOp_Operator) **OP_ATAN2** = `8`

Returns the arc-tangent of the parameters. Translates to ``atan(a, b)`` in the Redot Shader Language.<a id="VisualShaderNodeFloatOp_constant_OP_STEP"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[Operator](VisualShaderNodeFloatOp.md#enum_VisualShaderNodeFloatOp_Operator) **OP_STEP** = `9`

Generates a step function by comparing ``b``\\ (x) to ``a``\\ (edge). Returns 0.0 if ``x`` is smaller than ``edge`` and otherwise 1.0. Translates to ``step(a, b)`` in the Redot Shader Language.<a id="VisualShaderNodeFloatOp_constant_OP_ENUM_SIZE"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[Operator](VisualShaderNodeFloatOp.md#enum_VisualShaderNodeFloatOp_Operator) **OP_ENUM_SIZE** = `10`

Represents the size of the [Operator](VisualShaderNodeFloatOp.md#enum_VisualShaderNodeFloatOp_Operator) enum.<hr class="classref-section-separator"/>
